title: EUW SERVER LAG
body:
So basically, sometimes i get 30-40 ping each game, but then the ping starts to go up to 200-600 and this happens every game in EUW , my NA account gets a constant 117 ping each game with no alteration. This problem needs to be resolved cause a lot of my friends and even players in my games say they have the same problem in EUW. This has been occurring since the start of October and it's very irritating to just watch yourself glide around the map, and whenever i get into team fights it's even worse, sometimes i just die instantly and see i have 500 ping, then it lowers to 30 ping like nothing even happened. I NEED RIOT TO FIX THIS SERVER LAG, PLEASE HELP US.



-SithKon

replies.body: These sudden ping spikes sounds like packet loss or some sort of network instability.  Run a [log reader](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743-Connection-Troubleshooting-Log-Reader) of these games so we can get an analysis of your specific issue, and let me know what you find.  Keep in mind as well that you can run into issues because your physical distance to EU is pretty far (Unless you're playing from EU)!
